tool_description: Give a chords progression and receive a download link for the midi file
name: Chords progression to Midi file
title: Chords progression to Midi file

api_list.name: GetMidiLink
api_list.description: Give chords progression and receive a Midi download link
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chords-progression-to-midi-file.p.rapidapi.com/create_midi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chords-progression-to-midi-file.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
